Plintissa slowly circled around. Dracona put her blaster away and walked to=
ward Plintissa. Plintissa aproached. Dracona smiled and pulled out her rifl=
e. She shot Plintissa in the arm. Plintissa fell over, laying in a pool of =
mech fluid. She looked at her arm. It wasn't there anymore. Dracona laughed=
.

"You should have known better." Dracona said. Plintissa whipped a tentac=
le up and kncoked the rifle across the Earth a few miles away. Dracona shru=
gged and grabbed Plintissa's other arm, barring it and creating an armbar. =
Dracona's plan was to get rid of the other arm. Plintissa didn't fight back=
. She thought about her life and decided that she deserved to die. She trie=
d to kill the leader of the Maximals because he wouldn't pay attention to h=
er, but why did she do that? NOBODY has ever paid attention to her! She tri=
ed to behave herself while on this planet, she had killed a few back of Cyb=
ertron and didn't want to live anymore. She killed only criminals and kille=
rs, she didn't think there was anything wrong with that. But then Iron Rapt=
or started to ignore her. And now Dracona was killing her. She thought abou=
t it, but then looked at Artist, a tear was in his eye. She suddenly got mo=
re strength and pushed Dracona up and over her back. Dracona laughs.

"Fina=
lly, Plintissa! Finally you get guts!" Dracona said. Plintissa rapidly punc=
hed away at Dracona with her tentacles, protruding from her back. Dracona p=
ulled out a saw blade and sliced the tentacles off cleanly.

"Ha! Now what =
are you going to do? Bleed acid on me?" Dracona said. Plintissa fought back=
 with one arm but was easily cut down by Dracona.

"I don't know why you ev=
en tried, Plintissa, you were always stupid, when are you going to learn th=
at I am the smartest being on Earth?" Dracona asked.

"When you become smar=
ter, come back to fight me." Plintisa said. Dracona laughed and fell into a=
 pit, one Plintissa had planeted earlier. Dracona sprang up and sliced thro=
ugh metalic bars that were closing. Dracona knocks Plintissa INTO THE PIT A=
ND LAUGHS. (Sorry, Caps got turned on.) Dracona fired a second rifle into P=
lintissa's chest. Plintissa climbed slowly up but fell down again...
